Docs.summary: GLKit, a framework to simplify configuring and using OpenGL.

remarks.para: The main goal of GLKit is to simplify many repetitive and error prone tasks that developers face when building OpenGL code.
Easy blending of OpenGL content with Views and ViewControllers.

GLKit also offers a convenient way of loading images as GL textures -- both synchronously and asynchrously. The can load textures and cube maps from objects, in-memory binary data, files and arbitrary locations.
